body_html:
@wdirons I just tried this now, with cuda 9.1, but I cannot reproduce the problem.
Running this command got an all passing result for me:
bazel test --config=cuda tensorflow/python/kernel_tests:matrix_exponential_op_test --local_test_jobs=1 --runs_per_test=100

I will close this issue now, please reopen if you are still seeing it.

body:

Running this command got an all passing result for me:
bazel test --config=cuda tensorflow/python/kernel_tests:matrix_exponential_op_test --local_test_jobs=1 --runs_per_test=100

I will close this issue now, please reopen if you are still seeing it.
